item.description:
WODS Free Concert at the Hatch Shell with the Beach Boys
Picnic and Concert
Host: Adele and Jon
Type: Music/Arts - Concert
Network: Global
Date: Saturday, July 25, 2009
Time: 6:00pm - 9:30pm
Location: The Hatch Shell
Street: Storrow Drive, Boston, MA
City/Town: Cambridge, MA
View Yahoo Map
Google
MapQuest
Microsoft
Yahoo
Phone: 7813544802
Email: achang_01801@yahoo.com

Description
Concert at the Hatch Shell in Cambridge, MA With the Beach Boys. Take the Red Line to Charles River T Stop and walk across overpass to the Hatchsell. We will meet by 6 PM to Guarentee Space. Bring a Picnic Dinner with you and lawn chairs and/or blankets. Contact me if you want to carpool with us to the t station. I will try to have a Red Balloon with me or look for a chinese girl with a white hat with pink and red plaid ribbon attached to it. can't find us still then just sit and enjoy the concert anyways. You can always call my cell @ 781-354-4802 0r Jon's at 857-205-2857. Bring friends. They do not have to speak or know any Chinese because this was originally an event I set up on Facebook for my frineds to come and most don't speak Chinese and I then decided to invite people from another list (not a Chinese speaking list) and this list.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: WODS Free Concert at the Hatch Shell with the Beach Boys
